item.title: Fxxk SSH
item.description: 1 curl -O -L https://sourceforge.net/projects/sshpass/files/sshpass/1.06/sshpass-1.06.tar.gz && tar xvzf sshpass-1.06.tar.gz 2 ./configure 3 make install

item.title: The different between Session with Cookie
item.description: Session Session can store any type of data because the value is of data type of “object” These are stored at server side. Sessions are secured because it is stored in binary format/encrypted form and gets decrypted at server. Session is independent for every client i.e. individual for every client. There is no limitation on the size or number of sessions to be used in an application.

item.title: Get Wlan Password
item.description: 如何获取你知道/不知道的 wifi 密码 本文仅限于学习，请勿用于非法用途 否则后果作者概不负责 获取链接过的 wifi 密码 Windows: 管理员运行： 1for /f "skip=9 tokens=1,2 delims=:" %i in ('netsh wlan show profiles') do @echo

item.title: Linux Interview
item.description: Linux 先来100道题开开胃 cron daemon Cron 是一个守护程序，用于计划可以想象的任何类型的任务（管理系统日常任务的调度）。Windows 上被称为“Task Sc
